tool.name: verify_vulnerability_report
tool.description:
Submit verification decision for a pending vulnerability report.
Use this tool ONLY after attempting to reproduce the vulnerability. This is the ONLY way to finalize or reject a pending vulnerability report.
BEFORE CALLING: - You MUST have attempted to reproduce the vulnerability - You MUST have documented your reproduction attempts - You MUST have compared results to the original evidence
VERIFIED CRITERIA (verified=True): - Reproduced the exact same behavior as reported - Consistent results across 3+ attempts - Demonstrated actual security impact - Negative control confirmed authorization exists
REJECTED CRITERIA (verified=False): - Cannot reproduce despite following all steps - Reported behavior is normal functionality - No actual security impact demonstrated - Finding requires already having access

parameter.name: verified
parameter.description: True if vulnerability was successfully reproduced, False otherwise

parameter.name: verification_evidence
parameter.description: Evidence from successful verification (required if verified=True): - reproduction_count: Number of successful reproductions (recommend 3+) - baseline_response: Normal behavior observed without exploit - exploit_response: Behavior observed with exploit - negative_control: Result of unauthorized access test

parameter.name: rejection_reason
parameter.description: REQUIRED if verified=False. Clear explanation of why the vulnerability could not be verified. Examples: - "Cannot reproduce: response identical with and without payload" - "Not a vulnerability: data is intentionally public" - "Requires manual review: intermittent reproduction"

parameter.name: notes
parameter.description: Optional list of additional observations from verification

returns.description: Response with success status, final status (verified/rejected), and message

tool.name: list_pending_verifications
tool.description:
List all vulnerability reports pending verification.
Use this to see what reports need verification. Returns basic information about each pending report.

returns.description: Response with pending_count and pending_reports array containing id, title, severity, submitted_at, and verification_attempts for each report
